api_key.title: Enter API Key
api_key.description: Enter the API key for {device_name} ({address}), or check 'Auto-retrieve' to get it automatically (device must be in pairing mode: press and hold the light switch for 10 seconds until it blinks).

manual.title: Manual Device Entry
manual.description: Enter the device address and API key for your Leviton Decora Bluetooth light.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to device. Make sure the device is powered on, in range, and not connected to another client.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid API key. The device rejected authentication. Please verify the API key is correct or retrieve it again from the device in pairing mode.
error.not_in_pairing_mode: Device is not in pairing mode. Press and hold the light switch for 10 seconds until it blinks, then try again.
error.cannot_retrieve_key: Failed to retrieve API key from device. Make sure the device is in pairing mode (hold switch for 10 seconds until blinking).
error.no_devices_found: No Leviton Decora devices found. Make sure your device is powered on and in range, or use manual entry.
error.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Check the logs for more details.
